TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocumentWriter extends System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter

summary.span: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.

span.span: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks no tiene ningún constructor. has no constructor. Para crear un , utilice el método estático método de la de clase o utilice uno de los métodos estático métodos de la clase.To create an , use the static method of the class or use one of the static methods of the class. El documento o la cola que crea el se convierte en el destino en el que escribe.The document or the queue that creates the becomes the target to which it writes. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo se crea una instancia de la clase .The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. summary.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aunque la clase tiene un nombre en singular, un puede ser una o un conjunto de varios documentos.Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. Este método agrega el elementos en el origen para el conjunto de elementos en el destino o .This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . Esto método volverá a serializar especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento lo que se quitará todo el contenido de la que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).This method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. Este diseño método no llama a la eventos.By design this method does not call the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Write (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);

Public Sub Write (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)

override this.Write : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: The path of the source document.

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando `notificationLevel` está deshabilitado, el copia serializado[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento al destino o que creó el .When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . Cuando `notificationLevel` está habilitada, el primero deserializa el documento, a continuación vuelve a serializar y, a continuación, lo escribe en el destino con notificaciones de progreso sea de cada página de salida.When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. Aunque la clase tiene un nombre en singular, un puede ser una o un conjunto de varios documentos.Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. Este método agrega el elementos en el origen de la secuencia de elementos en el destino o .This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como , se generan notificaciones solo cuando se serializa el documento, no se imprimen.If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. Para recibir notificaciones que del documento debe ser vuelve a serializar.To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. Cuando se vuelve a serializar un documento de todo el contenido de la que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) se quita.When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como el documento no se vuelve a serializar y se conservará todo el contenido extendido, incluso cuando se imprima.If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. Este diseño método no llama a la eventos.By design this method does not call the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteAsync (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void WriteAsync(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub WriteAsync (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void WriteAsync(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.WriteAsync : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: The path of the source document.

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando `notificationLevel` está deshabilitado, el copia serializado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento al destino o que creó el .When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . Cuando `notificationLevel` está habilitada, el primero deserializa el documento, a continuación vuelve a serializar y, a continuación, lo escribe en el destino con notificaciones de progreso sea de cada página de salida.When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. Aunque la clase tiene un nombre en singular, un puede ser una o un conjunto de varios documentos.Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. Este método agrega el elementos en el origen de la secuencia de elementos en el destino o .This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como , se generan notificaciones solo cuando se serializa el documento, no se imprimen.If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. Para recibir notificaciones que del documento debe ser vuelve a serializar.To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. Cuando se vuelve a serializar un documento de todo el contenido de la que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) se quita.When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como el documento no se vuelve a serializar y se conservará todo el contenido extendido, incluso cuando se imprima.If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. Este diseño método no llama a la eventos.By design this method does not call the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks permite que un controlador de eventos que hay que sustituir un nuevo por el que se pasa a la operación de escritura. enables an event handler to substitute a new for the one that is passed to the write operation.
